title: Can I tell you a secret? Episode five: a mother’s love
description: Revisited: Journalist Sirin Kale meets Matthew Hardy’s mother to uncover more about his past – and what may have motivated him to cyberstalk his victims for so long. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: Can I tell you a secret? Episode five: a mother’s love
